Hi,

I=E2=80=99m new to using Heritrix and I=E2=80=99m trying to configure =
a job that will only pull pages from a URI with a path and a separate domai=
n (where some images are from).  For example I just want to get pages from:=


http://www.example.com/foo/baa/* <http://www.example.com/foo/baa/*> 		i.e=
. from this point in the domains path and any links that descend the path t=
ree from that point.
http://www,examplemedia.com/ <http://www,examplemedia.=
com/>		e.g where the images the previous site uses

As I understood it Heri=
trix applies restrictive rules already but it seems to be crawling up the p=
ath I am providing as a seed.  However I=E2=80=99m really struggling to mak=
e sense of the docs on Heritrix 3.2 on how exactly I do this.

I appreciate=
 any advice on how to do this.

Best regards,

Nigel


--Apple-Mail=_0FF57757-845C-4DB7-8F94-E0C185AC56BD
